title: Freeze in game
body:
Well, have some big freeze when i try to play. I cut chrome, steam, every applications but nothing change. I low my graphic to see if it help but no =/
pls help me !

replies.body: It sucks to hear your game is freezing, and I'd like to take a deeper look to see what's going on.  Is this something that happens regularly?  How long does it freeze, are you able to play at all?  Are you on Windows 10?  Let me know!
